name: Paul Godfrey
about: My home is a relaxed homestay where you can have your own privacy or socialize with me and other guests.

name: James T Hoffman
about: Since 2016, I've beeing operating a bespoke travel agency in the Maldives. Apart from being your host, I can help you plan your trip too! The Maldives has been my playground for over 10 years and I love to share my knowledge on how to best enjoy this beautiful country! Let me know what your requirements and I can plan a customised trip for it.

name: Nithya Shri
about:
Traveller, foodie and fitness enthusiast
Been to many countries around the world
